zombiescantgather.midnightconfig.zombies: Zombies can't pick up these items
zombiescantgather.midnightconfig.piglins: Piglins can't pick up these items
zombiescantgather.midnightconfig.tracker: The tracker logs potentially unwanted mobs and the reason for their persistence, accessible with the command §e/zcg tracker§f
zombiescantgather.midnightconfig.trackCu: Track mobs that were renamed with a nametag
zombiescantgather.midnightconfig.showTra: Log tracker updates in the console
zombiescantgather.midnightconfig.permiss:
The permission level needed to access Zombies Can't Gather commands.
See https://minecraft.wiki/w/Permission_level for permission levels. For more advanced
permission customization, use a permission manager like LuckPerms§f
